Erowid name: amphetamines
Category: CHEMICALS
Field: MainPage

                    Text: 
                    Donate now and receive yours!

Amphetamine



COMMON & BRAND NAMES

Speed; Dex; Adderall; Dexamphetamine; Vyvanse

EFFECTS CLASSIFICATION

Stimulant

CHEMICAL NAME

amphetamine

DESCRIPTION

Amphetamine is a strong physical and mental stimulant available widely in both prescription and street forms. It is the standard against which all other stimulants are measured.

BASICS

EFFECTS

IMAGES

HEALTH

LAW

DOSE

CHEMISTRY

2015 - Tablets imprinted with the "Captagon" logo in the Middle East generally contain amphetamine and caffeine, though "captagon" was originally a pharmaceutical brand name for a different chemical, fenethylline.

GENERAL INFORMATION #

Amphetamine Use Statistics

Amphetamines and Drug Tests

Amphetamines, Cocaine, A New Link

Dextro-amphetamine Info

Amphetamines Bits & Pieces

RELATED VAULTS #

Methamphetamine Vault

Methylphenidate (Ritalin) Vault

HISTORY #

Amphetamines Timeline

ASK EROWID ANSWERS #

Have you heard of ice (freebase MDMA)?


                    Context: 
                    This chunk is the introductory section of Erowid's amphetamine information page, presenting key facts such as common and brand names, effects classification, chemical name, and a basic description of amphetamine as a stimulant. It provides links to foundational topics like effects, health, law, dosage, chemistry, statistics, and general information, serving as the main overview before more detailed sections on history, research, and related substances.
